title: Wrap SkPaint.getFillPath()
body: The[ `SkPaint.getFillPath`](https://github.com/mono/skia/blob/885431314fcbd2833483cf77d7fc3309e217b53f/include/core/SkPaint.h#L470) method allows one to construct an SKPath by applying a paint to the given path. This is useful for, e.g. getting the path that describes a stroked path. The use cases are similar to `SKPaint.GetTextPath`, at least for me.
